A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved it. Minor nitpicking gripes with certain jokes that didn't land for me (most of the humor was well done... just a couple jokes were misplaced in serious scenes)\, and some pacing issues in the first and second acts. Overall\, I found it fascinating\, true to the Star Wars universe\, and the most realistic war movie above Rogue One. I will be seeing it again and again over the years. I expect to be more forgiving of my criticisms and more drawn into the characters than on first viewing.
